channel.title: How do i edit prices of items in shops?
channel.description:
Can somebody please explain?
i have the stuff in the shops but they are like 5gp ea.. please help and if you do thats rep++ if it works[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 07:38:47 PM[/size][hr]pl0x tell me!

item.title: How do i edit prices of items in shops?
item.dc:creator: @brandon3 brandon3
item.description:
@brandon3 wrote:

search for the item in item.cfg, then the second number you edit. (for me it is) and the have the price u want like 100mil, divide that by 1.26875 and add that instead =)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i edit prices of items in shops?

item.title: How do i edit prices of items in shops?
item.description:
@11121 wrote:

he wants the prices.

Open, items.CGF and search the item you want, then edit the first number (after the description)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i edit prices of items in shops?

item.title: How do i edit prices of items in shops?
item.dc:creator: @wrolyat wrolyat
item.description:
@wrolyat wrote:

Shouldn’t matter if it’s hamachi or not… that just sets up your server. The files are what counts. Open up your shops.cfg, find the shop you want to edit and then edit the amount or the item.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i edit prices of items in shops?

item.title: How do i edit prices of items in shops?

item.description:

if its hamachi go to sop handler and foof arround with it
